questions.quote: It's the Mohel! the Mohel is here! Thank God, the Mohel is here.
Do you want me to paint you something? I'd love to paint you some- thing!
Every time we go out to eat the minute we we're done eating she's runnin to the bathroom.
Oh, no, no! That's where it gets interesting! Don't you see? The - the train is bearing down on you, you - you dive into a side tunnel - and you run into a whole band of underground tunnel dwellers!
You're not getting no Drake's Coffee Cake for fifty cents. Yae, Hey, I'm all set. I got the ticket. I'm going to the Cayman Islands this Friday.
All right. I'll get pea pods and you can't have any of my pea pods.
All right, Silvio's down there. He's shoveling the walk. Now, all you gotta do is put this on, you go down to the corner, you pick up a paper, and you come right back.
Ok, thanks. Come on in for a second.  This is my brother, Ricky. He's home from college for the weekend.
Well, it's no big deal, you know, it's just that he can sound like a woman, you know?
Too spicy. He wants another one. You got that pasta primavera?
